review: I used this product for many months and it worked well. However, I had cause to compare the video output from the Amazon Fire TV to the output from my PlayStation 4 on both Netflix and Hulu Plus the I was surprised to see a dramatic difference. The picture quality on the PS4 was far superior and I have since started using that as my media box.

review: I travel full time and use my own verizon hotspot to connect wirelessly in my hotel rooms. Set up was a piece of cake. If you have just a little TV savvy it is very easy to connect to the hotel TV's HDMI port and use the manual inputs on the side of the TV to change the source. I picked it up when it went on sale, and I love the voice option on the remote. The only thing more that I could ask for is if it would emulate an Apple TV and allow me mirror from my iPad. Other than that I have no complaints whatsoever!
